utterance: wash two chicken thighs and place them in a large pot with enough water to cover them
add allspice, bay leaf, salt, and black pepper and cook on medium-high heat
while the chicken is cooking, peel and cut two carrots, two parsnips, a chunk of celery, some leek and onion
heat up the sliced onion on a dry pan until it gets singed
once the meat is somewhat cooked, add all the vegetables and cook until soft
serve the soup hot, you can add some pasta or fresh parsley to garnish
wash a chunk of pork with bone and place in a large pot with enough water to cover it
add allspice, bay leaf, salt, black pepper, and some dried mushrooms and cook on medium-high heat
add some crushed barley and cook until soft
take out the meat, separate it from bone, divide into smaller pieces and add back into the soup
serve the soup hot, with a dollop of sour cream and, optionally, some fresh parsley and bread
